title: Inkscapetober Day 28: Crispy
content:
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:black-highlighter-theme]]

[[include :scp-wiki:info:start]]
**Inkscapetober Day 28:** Crispy
**Author:** [[*user SleepOfReason]]
Check out more art [[[SleepOfReason creates art| here]]]
[[include :scp-wiki:info:end]]


[[=image DrFullham.png]]


**Subject:** Doctor Fullham

**Commentary:** When designing a coat of arms for Doctor Fullham, a ham must be included. It would be an easy mistake, however, to fill the entire coat of arms with hams. This is because of the motto, which is a Doctor Fullham quote. So instead I included a single fine ham. The background of the coat of arms are keys. One can ask Doctor Fullham in SkipIRC to show his list of keys, and then this will become clear. The supporters are boars, to further strengthen the theme of hams.

**How the prompt fits in:** It was only until it was too late that I realised that hams aren't actually crispy per se. They can be, if you honey glaze them or something. So let's assume that is what happened here.

@@ @@
